test_module.name: ${WASSP_TC_NAME}

FAILIF Fail PASSIF Pass SET PYTHON /home/svc-cgcsauto/wassp-repos/.venv_wassp/bin/python3
CALL export PYTHONPATH=${PYTHONPATH}:/home/svc-cgcsauto/wassp-repos/testcases/cgcs/CGCSAuto
CALL ${PYTHON} -m pytest -v -s --junit-xml=${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/result.xml --result-log=${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/test.log ${WASSP_TESTCASE_DIR}/../_samples/keywords_tests/test_vm_operations.py::test_ping_vms_from_vm_1['all']
